titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Grace George Earl of Melvil Their Majesties high commissioner, and the nobility, barons, and burrows, members of the high court of Parliament. In the Parliament-House, upon Sunday, May 11, 1690. By John Spalding, minister at Kirkcudbright.
titleStmt.author: Spalding, John, 1633?-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
